498890.name: Fantasy Grounds - D&D Tokens Volume 1
498890.description:
D&D Tokens Volume 1
D&D Tokens Volume 1 is a collection of monsters and NPCs from D&D's past that you can use with your modern Dungeons & Dragons game or with any fantasy game on Fantasy Grounds. These tokens were originally featured in the D&D Monster Vault boxed set, but have been presented in a completely new format with just the tokens - all digitally rendered and loaded into a token module for use with Fantasy Grounds.
* Note that the art from these creatures and NPCs come from D&D 4th Edition, and may have been visually re-concepted or may not have a corresponding monster or NPC in the latest version of Dungeons & Dragons. They can be used for custom creations or variants of existing creatures.
This set features digital tokens for the following iconic monsters and NPCs from Dungeons &Dragons:
  • abyssal eviscerator
  • air elemental
  • ambush drake
  • angel
  • angel valor

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Doug Davison
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included D&D fifth edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
